List of all members.

Detailed Description

Encapsulates PostgreSQL database support.

String liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase.getProductName (  ) 

Returns the full database product name.

May be different than what the JDBC connection reports (getDatabaseProductName())

Implements liquibase.database.Database.

String liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase.getTypeName (  ) 

Returns an all-lower-case short name of the product.

Used for end-user selecting of database type such as the DBMS precondition.

Implements liquibase.database.Database.

String liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase.getDefaultDriver ( String  url  ) 

If this database understands the given url, return the default driver class name.

Otherwise return null.

String liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase.getColumnType ( String  columnType,
Boolean  autoIncrement 
)

Returns the database-specific datatype for the given column configuration.

This method will convert some generic column types (e.g. boolean, currency) to the correct type for the current database.

Reimplemented from liquibase.database.AbstractDatabase.
